reviewText: It is not uninteresting, yet it says very little about adapting. It is more about screenwriting in general. That was not why I bought the dvd, so I actually should give it less stars...

I hate to give a negative review but watching this seminar was just down-right PAINFUL. It should've been titled 'Incoherent Thoughts About Screenwriting'. It is not specific to adaptation in the least and I doubt anyone new to screenwriting with an interest in adaptation will gain anything useful. It's just another sad homage to the old saying, "Those that can't do, teach."
